full_output.summary: An accounting expert has gained over 6 years of experience in financial management, auditing, and strategic planning in both the manufacturing industry and e-commerce. A proven track record of enhancing profitability and optimizing financial processes for manufacturing organizations. Proficient in leading high-performing teams and utilizing advanced accounting software such as Tally to ensure precise financial reporting.

Track revenue from design services, consultations, and any product sales. Generate and send invoices to clients for design services and products. Handling cost structures, including direct material costs, direct labour costs, and overhead costs.
